title: Hello and welcome to my website!

markdown.headingText: Hello and welcome to my website!
markdown.markdown:
::: {#about-block} ::: ::: {style="text-align: justify;"} I am Menasha Senanayaka, who is passionate in research and eager to use statistical methods to solve problems. A hard-working, responsible, adaptable, and fast-learning individual who has specialised statistics. Keen in searching for new concepts in the field of statistics. Interested in statistics and data science. I am looking forward for my higher studies journey. On this website, I offer a glimpse into my knowledge by sharing some of my work which includes Projects, Experience, Workshops and Blog Posts. Feel free to contact me for any inquiry, comments or statistical consultancy. ::: About me: ## **Education** * **BSc (Honours) in Statistics | January 2019 - June 2023**
Department of Statistics, Faculty of Applied Sciences, University of Sri Jayewardenepura
Sri Lanka * **GCE Ordinary Level and GCE Advanced Level | 2012 - 2017**
Southlands Girls College, Galle
Sri Lanka * **Schooling | 2004 - 2012**
Sussex College, Galle
Sri Lanka ## **Experience** * **Assistant Lecturer | August 2024 - Present**
Department of Mathematics, Faculty of Applied Sciences, University of Sri Jayewardenepura
Sri Lanka * **Visiting Lecturer | May 2024 - Present**
Institute of Applied Statistics Sri Lanka (IASSL)
Sri Lanka * **Teaching Assistant | July 2023 - April 2024**
Department of Statistics, Faculty of Applied Sciences, University of Sri Jayewardenepura
Sri Lanka * **Statistical Consultant | January 2023 - April 2024**
Department of Statistics, Faculty of Applied Sciences, University of Sri Jayewardenepura
Sri Lanka * **Intern - Data Analyst | June 2022 - December 2022**
Retailer Analytics Team, Analytics Division, Dialog Axiata PLC
Sri Lanka ## **Publications** * Senanayaka, N. I. M. B., & Pathberiya, H. A. (2024). Effectiveness of Using Candlestick Charts to Forecast Ethereum Price Direction: A Machine Learning Approach. *Sri Lankan Journal of Applied Statistics*, 25(1), 34-48.
DOI: 10.4038/sljas.v25i1.8131
* DSjobtracker: What Skills and Qualifications are Required for Data Science Related Jobs?
DOI: https://doi.org/10.32614/CRAN.package.DSjobtracker
## **Honours and Awards** * **IASSL Best Research Awards - 2023**
Organized by Institute of Applied Statistics Sri Lanka
Won a merit award for the undergraduate research project titled "Effectiveness of Using Candlestick Charts to Forecast Ethereum Price Direction: A Machine Learning Approach". ## **Memberships** General member - Life (MIASSL) at the Institute of Applied Statistics Sri Lanka - IASSL. ## **Volunteering** * **Member and Editorial Assistant**
Editorial board for the year 2025
Institute of Applied Statistics Sri Lanka (IASSL) and Sri Lanka Journal of Applied Statistics (SLJAS) * **Member**
Academic training committee for the year 2025
Institute of Applied Statistics Sri Lanka (IASSL) * **Editorial Assistant**
International Statistics Conference 2024 (ISC 2024)
Conference done in collaboration with Department of Statistics, University of Sri Jayewardenepura, Sri Lanka, Simon Fraser University, Canada and Institute of Applied Statistics Sri Lanka. ## **Languages** * **English**
Full professional proficiency | IELTS Overall Score: 7.0 (no band score less than 6.0) * **Sinhala**
Native or bilingual proficiency * **Tamil**
Elementary proficiency ## **Quote** *The best thing about being a statistician is that you get to play in everyone's backyard*
*-John Tukey-*
